description:
Sherry resolves once again to rescue Koko from Zofis’ mind control. She crushes one of Zofis’ arms with a gravity spell and sets things in motion for a counterattack! However, Zofis attacks utilizing his mobility, he brings Sherry and Brago to a standstil
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakushuu no Zofis, Yuujou o Saishuu Kessen!!
逆襲のゾフィス 友情の最終決戦!!
